alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Graves; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 12 at 5:57AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of western Kentucky, including the following areas, Ballard, Carlisle, Graves and McCracken. * WHEN...Until 615 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 455 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated the heavy rain has largely moved out of this area. However, water may be slow to recede due to 1 to 3 inches of rain that have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mayfield, Bardwell, Wickliffe, Reidland, Lovelaceville, Lowes, Fancy Farm, Blandville and Symsonia. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
